name: Runeforge Champion
oracle_text:
When Runeforge Champion enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a Rune card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.
You may pay {1} rather than pay the mana cost for Rune spells you cast.

name: Rune of Might
oracle_text:
Enchant permanent
When Rune of Might enters the battlefield, draw a card.
As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it gets +1/+1 and has trample.
As long as enchanted permanent is an Equipment, it has "Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has trample."

name: Rune of Mortality
oracle_text:
Enchant permanent
When Rune of Mortality enters the battlefield, draw a card.
As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it has deathtouch.
As long as enchanted permanent is an Equipment, it has "Equipped creature has deathtouch."

name: Rune of Speed
oracle_text:
Enchant permanent
When Rune of Speed enters the battlefield, draw a card.
As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, gets +1/+0 and has haste.
As long as enchanted permanent is an Equipment, it has "Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has haste."

name: Rune of Sustenance
oracle_text:
Enchant permanent
When Rune of Sustenance enters the battlefield, draw a card.
As long as enchanted permanent is a creature, it has lifelink.
As long as enchanted permanent is an Equipment, it has "Equipped creature has lifelink."

name: "Draugr Recruiter"
oracle_text: Boast — {3}{B}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. (Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

name: Righteous Valkyrie
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another Angel or Cleric enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
As long as you have at least 7 life more than your starting life total, creatures you control get +2/+2.

name: Doomskar
oracle_text:
Destroy all creatures.
Foretell {1}{W}{W} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

name: Resplendent Marshal
oracle_text:
Flying
When Resplendent Marshal enters the battlefield or dies, you may exile another creature card from your graveyard. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control other than Resplendent Marshal that shares a creature type with the exiled card.

name: Icebreaker Kraken
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each snow land you control.
When Icebreaker Kraken enters the battlefield, artifacts and creatures target opponent controls don't untap during that player's next untap step.
Return three snow lands you control to their owner's hand: Return Icebreaker Kraken to its owner's hand.

name: Mists of Littjara
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature or Vehicle
Enchanted creature gets -3/-0.
flavor_text: The Skelle raiders boast that nothing could stop them, certainly not a bit of fog.

name: "Adios Wormhole"
oracle_text:
Return target nonland permanent to its owners's hand.
Foretell {U} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

name: "Misty Stepper"
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
Flying
{1}{U}: "Misty Stepper" gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

name: Vengeful Reaper
oracle_text:
Flying, deathtouch, haste
Foretell {1}{B} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

name: Bind the Monster
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Bind the Monster enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. It deals damage to you equal to its power.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
flavor_text: Sarulf's snarl of rage shook the World Tree.

name: Struggle for Skemfar
oracle_text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights up to one target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
Foretell {G} (During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)

name: Elven Bow
Great Hall of Starnheim
oracle_text:
Great Hall of Starnheim enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
{W}{W}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Great Hall of Starnheim and a creature you control: Create a 4/4 white Angel Warrior creature token with flying and vigilance. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Valor of the Worthy
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
When enchanted creature leaves the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: "If I am to die, let it be a hero's death!"

name: "King Narfi's Betrayal"
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Each player mills four cards. You may exile up to one creature or planeswalker card from each graveyard.
II, III — Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among cards exiled with "King Narfi's Betrayal", and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.

name: Wolverine Riders
oracle_text:
At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token.
Whenever another Elf enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to its toughness.
flavor_text: "We'll break their lines. The rest of you, follow!"

name: Inspired Sphinx
oracle_text:
Flying
When Inspired Sphinx enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to the number of opponents you have.
{3}{U}: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

name: "Family Get-Together"
oracle_text:
Choose a creature type. Return up to two creature cards of the chosen type from your graveyard to the battlefield. If this spell was foretold, return all creature cards of the chosen type from your graveyard to the battlefield instead.

name: "Family Get-Together"

name: Burning-Rune Demon
oracle_text:
Flying
When Burning-Rune Demon enters the battlefield, you may search your library for exactly two cards not named Burning-Rune Demon that have different names. If you do, reveal those cards. An opponent chooses one of them. Put the chosen card into your hand and the other into your graveyard, then shuffle your library.

name: In Search of Greatness
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may cast a permanent spell from your hand with converted mana cost equal to 1 plus the highest converted mana cost among other permanents you control without paying its mana cost. If you don't, scry 1.

name: Starnheim Courser
oracle_text:
Flying
Artifact and enchantment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: Every worthy warrior who arrives in Starheim is gifted a mount befitting their heroism, a mighty pegasus raised and trained by the valkyries.

name: Sethron, Hurloon General
oracle_text:
Whenever Sethron, Hurloon General or another nontoken Minotaur enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/3 red Minotaur creature token.
{2}{B/R}: Minotaurs you control get +1/+0 and gain menace and haste until end of turn. ({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.)

Flying

name: Invoke the Divine
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.
flavor_text: "Let's see how brave you really are behind all that oak and steel."

name: Weigh Down
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard.
Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The draugr often drown intruders. Years later, their corpses rise from the depths to join the ranks of teh Dread Marn.

name: Orvar, the All-Form
oracle_text:
Changeling
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, if it targets one or more other permanents you control, create a token that's a copy of one of those permanents.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard this card, create a token that's a copy of target permanent.

name: Shackles of Treachery
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gains haste and "Whenever this creature deals damage, destroy target Equipment attached to it."
flavor_text: In that instant, Toralf felt only the power of the storm and the need to destroy.

Changeling

name: Brinebarrow Intruder
oracle_text:
Flash
When Brinebarrow Intruder enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

name: Craven Hulk
oracle_text: Craven Hulk can't block alone.
flavor_text: Abandoned at birth, the giant was raised by goats. Ironically, it grew up to be the most cautious member of the herd.

name: "The First Snowman"
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Mill three cards.
II — Return up to two snow permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand.
III — Choose up to three cards in each graveyard. Their owners shuffle those cards into their libraries.

name: Immersturm Raider
oracle_text: When Immersturm Raider enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

oracle_text:

Whenever you foretell a card, Dream Devourer gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
